law.catch_line: Sanitation requirements for barber, independent contract owner, or student.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 7, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 7, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 354, sec. 22. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 17, effective June 30, 1960.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 675, instructs the Reviser of Statutes to correct statutory references to agencies and officers whose names have been changed in the Act, as it confirms the establishment of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services. Such a correction has been made in this section.
